name: Familia Sunt Aranearum
description:
Mom? Dad?

Something doesn't seem right, can't they see them? Defend yourself in your parent's car in this short FNAF style game, where things escalate each mile.

This is my longest game so far so I hope you enjoy (and took the longest to develop: 3-4 weeks). I added some features to make the game more accessible:

  • Sensitivity Slider
  • Volume Slider
  • Full Resolution Support

Other Notes:

  • Arachnophobia Warning
  • Jump-scare Warning
  • Headphones Recommended
  • (Kudos to anyone who figures out who Lisa is)

Please feel free to leave any feedback in the comments and share with your friends, thanks guys :)!
